value.name: Lee Westwood: PGA Tour 'Hypocrites' After Payout Increases, New Tournament Schedule
value.description: Lee Westwood thinks the PGA Tour's new initiatives show its hypocrisy as it tries to combat the emergence of LIV Golf. In an interview with Golf Digest's John Huggan, Westwood said his reaction to the Tour's announcement this week was to laugh because "there are a lot of hypocrites out there.

value.name: Top seed Scottie Scheffler expands Cup lead
value.description: Masters champion Scottie Scheffler might have had a roller coaster of an opening round Thursday at the Tour Championship if only he had been paying attention to the scoreboards.

value.name: 2022 Tour Championship purse, prize money: Payout for each golfer in FedEx Cup Playoffs ...
value.description: A record-setting year on the PGA Tour will end in record fashion as the largest prize pool in league history will be up for grabs this week at the 2022 Tour Championship. Between deferral payments and bonuses,

value.name: Column: Golf's season of discontent ends, but more to come
value.description: Golf's season of discontent reaches its official stopping point this weekend at the Tour Championship. Predicting where the sport goes from here is sort of like trying to hole a shot from the fairway.

value.name: Watch: Monday Night Will Soon Be Golf Night
value.description: The future is here. Or at least it may be coming in January of 2024. Tiger Woods and Rory McIlory revealed plans to launch a tech-infused golf venture that will pit teams of three PGA Tour stars against each other... in a stadium. If nothing else, the new product promises to be interesting and showcase golf in a (very) different light.

value.name: Paula Reto shoots course-record 62, leads CP Women’s Open
value.description: Paula Reto shot a course-record 9-under 62 on Thursday at Ottawa Hunt and Golf Club to take a two-stroke lead in the Canadian Pacific Women’s Open. “It’s not something I’m familiar with,” Reto said about the low score. Winless on the LPGA Tour, the 32-year-old South African opened with a 6-under 29 on the back nine and added three ...

value.name: Roundup: Pa. football season kicks off Friday; Petrochko fires a 32 vs. Ursuline
value.description: The 2022 high school football season kicks off Friday in Pennsylvania. A total of 10 games are on the schedule Friday along with two region games on Saturday. Only three games Friday will be played locally: Farrell hosts North East at Westminster College,

value.name: Westwood blasts 'hypocrites', claims PGA changes only copy LIV Golf
value.description: England's Lee Westwood says US PGA Tour changes announced for next season are simply copies of what the Saudi-backed LIV Golf circuit is doing. Westwood said he hopes to play in four DP World Tour events next year and looks forward to playing in the BMW PGA Championship next month at Wentworth,
